SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNTITY_GETID_BYLOOKUPID
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Retrieve the Sponsorship Opportunity ID based on the lookup id of the sponsorship opportunity
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNTITY_GETID_BYLOOKUPID ( @sponsorshipOpportunityLookupID nvarchar(100) = '' ) returns uniqueidentifier with execute as caller as begin declare @sponsorshipOpportunityID uniqueidentifier = null
if @sponsorshipOpportunityLookupID <> '' select @sponsorshipOpportunityID = ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY where LOOKUPID = @sponsorshipOpportunityLookupID
return @sponsorshipOpportunityID end
